verses.name: Jeremiah 32:15
verses.text: For thus saith the Lord of hosts, the God of Israel; Houses and fields and vineyards shall be possessed again in this land.

verses.name: Jeremiah 32:16
verses.text: Now when I had delivered the evidence of the purchase unto Baruch the son of Neriah, I prayed unto the Lord, saying,

verses.name: Jeremiah 32:17
verses.text: Ah Lord God! behold, thou hast made the heaven and the earth by thy great power and stretched out arm, and there is nothing too hard for thee:
